Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aparthotel Aquasol, you'll be centrally located in Calvia, walking distance from Palma Nova Beach and close to Golf Fantasia. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Pirates Adventure Show and Western Water Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 132 guestrooms, featuring kitchens. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and sofa beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities include an arcade/game room, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Aparthotel Aquasol, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Aparthotel Aquasol, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palma Nova Beach - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Golf Fantasia - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Pirates Adventure Show - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Western Water Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Poniente Golf Club - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Marineland Mallorca - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Puerto Portals Marina - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Santa Ponsa Beach - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Mago Beach - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Real Golf Bendinat - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Port of Adriano - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Cala Mayor Beach - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Marivent Palace - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
San Carlos Castle - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Mallorca Casino - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Aquasol is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
